Description of incident: "Payment cards used at Vera Bradley store locations between July 25, 2016 and September 23, 2016 may have been affected. Not all cards used in stores during this time frame were affected. Cards used on verabradley.com were not affected.  Information on steps customers may take to protect their information can be found at www.verabradley.com/protectingourcustomers."The information compromised included all information on the magnetic stripe of the card. The information on the stripe includes the card number, name on the card, expiration date and verification code. More Information: http://investors.verabradley.com/releasedetail.cfm?ReleaseID=993213
